title: Learning Design and Item Development Program Based on PISA Mathematical Literacy Assessment

context.prior_knowledge: Knowledge of basic mathematics education theories and assessment design experience
context.additional_context: Aims to enhance the ability to design mathematics literacy assessments based on the PISA framework for corporate education managers/leaders, emphasizing collaborative learning with personal devices

learning_goals: Learners can understand the PISA mathematical literacy assessment framework and apply it to actual instructional design.
Learners can independently design mathematical literacy assessment items that meet PISA standards.
Learners can improve their ability to revise assessment items by incorporating peer and expert feedback through formative evaluation.

resources: Mathematical literacy assessment item sample database
Online Collaboration Tools (e.g., Google Workspace, Miro)
Personal laptop/tablet (BYOD: Bring Your Own Device)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
